title: I changed my email and all my old tickets are appearing and disappearing depending on which email
body: That ticket randomly disappeared that was trying to fix everything since my account got suspended and was wondering what i can do here since everything keeps disappearing and reappearing i will try to make a new ticket but what happened was my account got suspended for no reason and i think its because of my other accounts that were connected to my email appeared and those tickets were for another account that got hacked so i think they suspended this account for protection reasons and i really want this account to be unsuspended since there is nothing wrong and i did nothing wrong

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing issues with our ticketing system? Note that for certain security reasons, account recoveries need to be submitted using [**this form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). 

Let me know if you have any questions.
